subject: Re: Order #SSN3790 - Missing Item
description_text:
Hi,

Thanks for sending the replacement part. Unfortunately, I now seem to have received x2 of these items and I only require x1.

Please advise if I need to return the extra item to you and how?

Many thanks,
Sam

________________________________
From: service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 18, 2025 10:40
To: sam2.cooper@live.com <sam2.cooper@live.com>
Subject: Re: Order #SSN3790 - Missing Item

Hi Sam Cooper,

We apologize for the delayed response! We have arranged for a replacement shipment. Please cancel your chargeback as soon as possible. Here is your tracking link:
https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047184830356
We apologize for any inconvenience caused!



On Sat, 6 Dec at 8:59 AM , Sam Cooper <sam2.cooper@live.com> wrote:
Hi,

I have recently received my package for Order #SSN3790 however I seem to be missing the Plus X Pedal Control Box.
Please see photo attached of the package received.

Your help in resolving this matter quickly would be greatly appreciated.

Many thanks,
Sam Cooper.
7567:4206036

conversations.body_text: Hi Sam Cooper,  Please take photos of the parts you received and send them to us. In most cases, a return is not required, and we will handle it accordingly.Â
